body.en:
We are a small pre-loved luxury boutique in the heart of Budapest, curating handbags and accessories with stories and character.
Our selection focuses on classic houses such as HermÃ¨s, Chanel and Louis Vuitton. We only deal in authentic items and carefully choose pieces that are both beautiful and practical.

body.en:
1. Send us photos of the item and basic information via WhatsApp (brand, model, purchase channel, condition, etc.).
2. We make a preliminary evaluation and suggest a selling price.
3. Book an in-store appointment to inspect the item and confirm the price and details.
4. Sign the consignment contract and place the item on display â€“ the usual consignment period is around 60 days.
